title: AIDS: Automatic Intelligent Delivering System
description: A software prototype that was used as a main controller for the (Raspberry Pi 3 Model B) as the mainboard in developing AIDS (Automatic Intelligent Delivery System). The system was automated and have a collision-avoidance system, distance limitation system, and track detection system for safe and efficient carrying of parcels in its proper place. The system also have an Application API so that users may choose to run it in autopilot mode or controller mode for manual use.
